## Document.getPresences() method

`getPresences` returns the presences of online clients.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPresences(): Array<{
        clientID: ActorID;
        presence: P;
    }>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;{ clientID: [ActorID](./yorkie-js-sdk.actorid.md)<!-- -->; presence: P; }&gt;
